pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sensitivity Analysis for Full Matching in Observational Studies // Sensitivity to unmeasured biases in an observational study that is a full match. Function senfm() performs tests and function senfmCI() creates confidence intervals. The method uses Huber's M-statistics, including least squares, and is described in Rosenbaum (2007, Biometrics) DOI:10.1111/j.1541-0420.2006.00717.x.
